name: Winnipeg Police Service
profile:
This is the official You Tube channel of the Winnipeg Police Service (WPS). 

Subscribe to our channel for video updates concerning breaking news and as well as new initiatives undertaken by the WPS.

In case of emergency, or if you need police assistance, dial 9-1-1. For non-emergencies, please call (204) 986-6222.

Do not use this page to report a crime.

Please note: 

Comments posted by others on the page do not necessarily represent the Service's opinion nor does the WPS endorse any third-party comments.

The WPS welcomes a person's right to express his/her opinion and encourages users to keep comments related to content on this page.

Posts to this page are monitored only intermittently.
